## SavedObjectsSerializer.savedObjectToRaw() method

Converts a document from the saved object client format to the format that is stored in opensearch.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
savedObjectToRaw(savedObj: SavedObjectSanitizedDoc): SavedObjectsRawDoc;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  savedObj | [SavedObjectSanitizedDoc](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsanitizeddoc.md) | The saved object to be converted to raw OpenSearch format. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[SavedObjectsRawDoc](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsrawdoc.md)
